verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu mammunu nadipinchu, needu kaapu Kaavalen neevu mammunu boshinchu mammu Jerchu doddilon Yesu naadhaa, Priya naadhaa Mammu vimochimpumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mammu naadarinchu Yesoo maaku Paala kundavu paapa maargamandu nundi Prematho dappinchumee Yesu naadha Priya naadhaa ! mora naalakinchumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Beeda paapulaina mammu nee Vangeekarinthuvu mammunu bavitraparchi Mammu vidipinchumee, Yesu naadhaa ! Priya naadhaa ! ninnu naashrayinthumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Balyamandu ninnu jeri ninnu haththu kondumu Priya rakshakunda Yesoo needu prema joopumaa ! Yesu naadhaa Priya naadhaa mamminka Preminchumaaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
